attributes.action: Give schools and students clearer information regarding exams in 2021
attributes.additional_details: The vagueness is making students stress about previously done mock exams and stress about whats to come. Students need a clear view of whats to come and need to know how they will get their final grades. We need to stop messing around.
attributes.background: The government keeps giving us these vague messages about what the plan for exams is but nobody actually knows the real truth.

rejection.details: The Department for Education and Ofqual are consulting on the approach to awarding GCSE, AS and A level grades in 2021 following the cancellation of exams. You can find out more about this consultation here: https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/consultation-on-how-gcse-as-and-a-level-grades-should-be-awarded-in-summer-2021
